tool.name: ETE taxa DB generator
tool.description: generates the ETE sqlite DB from the NCBI taxdump.tar.gz

param.name: latest
param.label: Get latest version
param.help: Get the latest version of the taxdump from the NCBI website

param.name: taxdump
param.label: NCBI taxdump
param.help: NCBI taxonomy database dump in tar.gz format

tool.help:
Generates the ETE sqlite data base from the NCBI taxdump.tar.gz using the .. _ETE Toolkit: http://etetoolkit.org/
**Input**
- NCBI taxdump: NCBI taxdump in tar.gz format. If not given the latest is downloaded from ftp://ftp.ncbi.nih.gov/pub/taxonomy/taxdump.tar.gz
**Output**
- *(ETE3) Taxonomy Database* a sqlite database that has been created by ETE from the NCBI taxonomy dump
